about_the_game: Third person tactical action in flag capture mode. Players have to split into two teams and confront each other.  Protect your house or try to steal treats – choice is yours! Join one of the teams, plan tactics and try to win! Several game modes, dozens of objects to interact with, exciting gameplay and pretty graphics – all in one!  Six character classes, interactive environment and customization are waiting for you in team play game – FurFury. Remember, everything can turn against you any moment!

short_description: Raccoon Mike is going to celebrate his birthday, but he has nothing to treat to friends. Loyal friends decide to help him collect treats in house with not very hospitable owners.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Polish
